detection module¶

This module provides the DetectionEngine class, which implements traffic classification using a pre-trained machine learning model and network flow statistics. It calculates various inter-arrival time features and performs prediction of traffic type (benign or attack).

detection.py

DetectionEngine class for traffic classification based on network flow features.

Features: - Loads pre-trained machine learning model, scaler, and label encoder from disk. - Computes flow-related features (e.g., inter-arrival times statistics). - Performs prediction to classify traffic type (e.g., BENIGN or attack). - Modular methods for feature calculation and model inference. - Designed for integration with HTTP request handlers or other detection systems.

Author: Rafael Malla Martinez Date: 2025-06-06

class detection.DetectionEngine(base_dir, model_path='knn_model.pkl', scaler_path='scaler.pkl', le_path='label_encoder.pkl')¶

Bases: object

calc_max(data)¶

Calculate the maximum value in a list. Return 0 if the input is None or empty.

calc_mean(data)¶

Calculate the mean (average) of values in a list. Return 0 if the input is None or empty.

calc_min(data)¶

Calculate the minimum value in a list. Return 0 if the input is None or empty.

calc_std(data)¶

Calculate the standard deviation of values in a list. Return 0 if the input is None or empty.

calc_total(data)¶

Calculate the sum of values in a list. Return 0 if the input is None or empty.

calcular_features(iat_forward, flow_start_time, iat_backward=None, idle_times=None)¶

Compute the feature vector for the detection model from raw input data: - Calculate flow duration based on current time and flow start time. - Compute statistics (total, max, mean, std, min) for forward and backward IATs and idle times. - Combine features into a single-row pandas DataFrame matching the expected input format.

Parameters:

  • iat_forward (list) -- Forward inter-arrival times.

  • flow_start_time (float) -- Timestamp when the flow started.

  • iat_backward (list, optional) -- Backward inter-arrival times.

  • idle_times (list, optional) -- Idle times.

Returns:

DataFrame with one row containing all features.

Return type:

pandas.DataFrame

detect(iat_forward, flow_start_time, iat_backward=None, idle_times=None)¶

Main detection function: - Calculate features based on input forward/backward inter-arrival times and flow start time. - Print the feature vector for debugging purposes. - Validate feature vector shape before prediction. - Return the predicted class label (e.g., benign or attack).

Parameters:

  • iat_forward (list) -- Forward inter-arrival times.

  • flow_start_time (float) -- Timestamp when the flow started.

  • iat_backward (list, optional) -- Backward inter-arrival times.

  • idle_times (list, optional) -- Idle times within the flow.

Returns:

Predicted class label after decoding.

Return type:

str

predecir(feature_vector_df)¶

Perform the prediction: - Scale the feature vector using the loaded scaler. - Predict the encoded class label using the loaded model. - Decode the predicted label to a human-readable class name.

Parameters:

feature_vector_df (pandas.DataFrame) -- DataFrame containing one row of features.

Returns:

Decoded predicted class label.

Return type:

str

blacklist_server
